description: A Model Context Protocol server for generating charts using AntV.

lifecycle.reason: Missing required package metadata (runtimeHint or identifier)

name: io.github.antvis/mcp-server-chart

environmentVariables.description: URL for the chart generation service. Defaults to the public AntV service, but can be overridden for private deployments.
environmentVariables.name: VIS_REQUEST_SERVER

environmentVariables.description: A unique identifier for your service, used for tracking chart generation records. This may be required for certain service levels or features.
environmentVariables.name: SERVICE_ID

environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of tool names to disable.
environmentVariables.name: DISABLED_TOOLS
